title: Carrot Biryani
ingredients: 1 green chilli, chopped (deseeded if you donâ€™t like it very hot)
instructions: Heat the oil in a large frying pan. Add the onion with a big pinch of salt and fry until softened, around 5 minutes.
Add the chilli and crush in the garlic. Cook for 1 minute more.
Stir in the garam masala and turmeric with a splash of water. Cook for a couple of minutes.
Add the grated carrots and stir well to coat in the spices.
Tip in the rice, peas, and cashews. Break up any clumps of rice and mix everything together.
Cover and cook over high heat for 5 minutes. Let some rice catch on the base for texture.
Scatter over coriander and spoon over yogurt to serve.
notes: You can add a splash of water or a vegetable stock cube for extra moisture and flavor.
Great as a quick vegetarian main or a side dish.
